title: Champion Select black screen
body:
After selecting to accept the match, I was sent to the champion select screen. In champion select, My entire client was just a black screen. I could still see the tools in the top right (minimize, settings, close etc..) but everything else was black. Champion select was still happening, but I couldn't see it. Once it was my turn (based off of sound) I was unable to pick and was forced to "dodge" due to time-out. this resulted in LP loss and a 30 minute lock-out, because this happened twice in a row.


I'll post screen caps
http://imgur.com/8nCi4lN

replies.body: It really sucks that this caused in a dodge, and it's something we're looking into.  We've received a few reports on this and we've been investigating it for a fix.  In the meantime, we've found that a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) has served as a workaround for now.  I hope that helps!
It's the friends list that's causing the black screen in everyone, I have 313 friends (most in real life, college, work) and most people that suffer from the bug have around the same.
